channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientMac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientMac

item.title: CVE-2021-42754|2024-08-04T03:38:50.143Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20forticlientmac
item.description: An improper control of generation of code vulnerability [CWE-94] in FortiClientMacOS versions 7.0.0 and below and 6.4.5 and below may allow an authenticated attacker to hijack the MacOS camera without the user permission via the malicious dylib file.
